description: Creates a new user on the platform and returns it in response body. The new user has initially insecure authentication scheme. The user interface should politely interrogate if further authentication scheme could be used by the user upon registration of the user.

username.description: Name of the new user. Must be 8-20 lowercase characters and alphanumeric.

password.description: Password of the new user. Must be 8-32 characters with UTF-8 encoding.

inserted_at.description: Registration date of the user in ISO 8601 format.
